lightStep.description: LightStep is an e-commerce platform dedicated to barefoot shoes, a niche that values natural comfort and free foot movement. The goal: to create a smooth and minimalist experience that reflects the product itself. I designed an application capable of handling several thousand products and users, with a database optimized for performance and scalability. The UX was carefully crafted to minimize the number of required interactions, using modals, subtle transitions, and a direct purchase flow. The UI, designed in Figma, visually conveys the project’s minimalist philosophy. LightStep allowed me to combine design, ergonomics, and solid technical architecture to build an application that is both high-performing and consistent.

nutribouge.description: Showcase site for a sports coaching and dietetics practice. A comprehensive platform offering individual and group coaching services, with pricing system, contact form, presentation of therapeutic education and dietetics services.

samanarace.description: SamanaRace is an intuitive and responsive booking application that allows users to easily schedule events. It includes a multilingual contact form to facilitate communication, providing real-time feedback on the status of sent messages. The interface is designed to offer a smooth user experience across all devices.
